scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:platform" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd apps/web && npm run build" "cd apps/platform && npm run build" "cd apps/admin && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd apps/web && npm run start" "cd apps/platform && npm run start" "cd apps/admin && npm run start"
